detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with triangle cups, removable inserts and ties at the top. Seam at the waist, a low-cut back and laser-cut scalloped trims.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with a detachable tie belt, hook-and-eye fasteners, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a button. Side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with a medium-height shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length, heavily draping skirt in chiffon with fringes made from plastic beads. High, grosgrain waistband and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Short legs, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with a narrow frill trim at the hems.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace. Opening cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin-covered Alice band with a decorative sequined bow at the top.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable, braided belt at the waist and rounded hem.

Bikini top with side support, a silicone trim at the top and lacing with shimmering plastic links at the front. Removable inserts, detachable ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, an elasticated waist, and skirt with gathered seams. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless, nursing dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Long-sleeved top in nepped linen-blend jersey with a lace frill trim at the hem.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.

Trainers in fabric and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front, loop at the back and rubber appliqué on the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Bikini top with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide metal fastening at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Top in a double layer of airy, crinkled chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Small frill trim at the top, elastication at the top of the back and a decorative hole pattern at the hem. Lined.
A-line, pleated dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Lined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Metal hair clips with acetate on top. Length 6.5 cm.
Short, straight-style dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in seersucker made from a cotton blend with a partial wrapover with ties at one side and a concealed zip at the other. Asymmetric hem at the front. Unlined.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with an overlocked flounce trim over the shoulders and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Puff pants with covered elastication at the waist and narrow elastication and an overlocked frill trim around the legs.

Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details and a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs. The shorts are made partly from recycled cotton.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.
A-line dress with double-layered flutter sleeves and shimmering buttons at the back of the neck. Lined.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button at the waist, front and back pockets, and raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons at the back of the neck and ties that fasten at one side. Deep cut-out section at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.

Sleeveless playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with elastication around the neckline and decorative ties at the front. Concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and overlocked, scalloped hems.
Straight-cut jacket in soft imitation leather with a faux fur-lined collar, zip down the front and welt front pockets. Faux fur lining.
Bucket hat in a cotton weave with a frayed edge. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
Joggers in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
V-neck top in silk crêpe with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in a soft knit with a round, slightly wider neckline, gently dropped shoulders and rounded hem.
Calf-length A-line dress in patterned chiffon in a narrow cut at the top with a gathered stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated with plastic beads at the top of the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and a chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves and hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and short sleeves with a wide flounced trim.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a straight style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elastication and a narrow frill trim around the hems.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a V-neck and draping at the front. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with gentle draping at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and diagonal side pockets.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long T-shirt in cotton jersey. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front, a round neck and buttons down the front. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaping briefs in lace and sturdy microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the waist.
Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and wide ties at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
